domain_url.title: Domain Url
domain_url.description: Your Marketo Base URL. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Your Marketo client_id. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Your Marketo client secret. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Access token generated using client_id, and client_secret.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Data generated in Marketo after this date will be replicated. This date must be specified in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

window_in_days.title: Window In Days
window_in_days.description: The amount of days for each data-chunk begining from start_date. (Min=1, as for a Day; Max=30, as for a Month).
